Articles.Content: So I have been wanting to buy KSP and was wondering if there was going to be a Christmas Discount for KSP.... If there is when will it be up.... Thanks

Almost a guarantee. Note I said almost. Steam always has a Christmas sale and KSP has been in nearly every *major* Steam Sale I've seen, so it's a fairly safe bet there will be a discount.

Edited December 18, 2014 by Alshain

Check for 3rd Party Sites that sell steamkeys for games. Maybe they have some Keys for KSP in stock from the last Sale.

But you might want to check the liability on Google beforehand.
Well I was going to buy it from the KSP store.... Does the ksp store has a discount?
I don't know if the Squad store has a discount, but its my understanding that Squad gets more of the money if you buy it from the store.
I HIGHLY recommend checking Steam if you haven't already. I've bought 90% of my games from them in various sales, and I've never been disappointed in the price.
Welp, KSP is 25% off on the Steam Store right now.

The daily deals on steam will be where you want to look, they update at 6PM GMT.

Otherwise I'd recommend waiting till the last day of the sale for most any price you're seeing at the moment.
